title: Thursday Post Show (03-03-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (03-03-22)
description:
Bobby starts with Morgan2 who thinks we need to have a cleaning day at the studio. Morgan also has an issue with listeners who go after her for sharing certain articles on Facebook. Bobby talks about the verdict on Kim Kardashian and Kanye West’s divorce. We talk to Paul who went from being a cook to owning over 31 Sonic’s. He shares how he went from being poor to being so successful. We also discussed the Dua Lipa song lawsuit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
